waitComplete

void waitComplete(java.lang.Integer msTimeout)
Wait for the operation to complete. Use this method to synchronize the application with the last ES operation.
Parameters:
msTimeout - A maximum timeout (in milliseconds) before the wait method returns, whether the operation has been completed or not. Default value is 5000 milliseconds
